1:
I will praise Yahweh at all times,\q his praise will always be in my mouth.


\q
2:
I will praise Yahweh!\q May the oppressed hear and rejoice.
\q
3:
Praise Yahweh with me,\q let us lift up his name together.


\q
4:
I sought Yahweh and he answered me,\q and he gave me victory over all my fears.
\q
5:
Those who look to him are radiant,\q and their faces are not ashamed.
\q
6:
This oppressed man cried and Yahweh heard him\q and saved him from all his troubles.


\q
7:
The angel of Yahweh camps around those who fear him\q and rescues them.
\q
8:
Taste and see that Yahweh is good.\q Blessed is the man who takes refuge in him.
\q
9:
Fear Yahweh, you his holy people.\q There is no lack for those who fear him.


\q
10:
The young lions sometimes lack food and suffer hunger,\q but those who seek Yahweh will not lack anything good.
\q
11:
Come, sons, listen to me.\q I will teach you the fear of Yahweh.


\q
12:
What man is there who desires life\q and loves many days,
\q that he may see good?
\q
13:
Then keep your tongue from evil\q and keep your lips from speaking lies.
\q
14:
Turn away from evil and do good.\q Seek peace and go after it.


\q
15:
The eyes of Yahweh are on the righteous\q and his ears are directed toward their cry.
\q
16:
The face of Yahweh is against those who do evil,\q to cut off the memory of them from the earth.
\q
17:
The righteous cry out and Yahweh hears\q and he rescues them from all their troubles.


\q
18:
Yahweh is close to the brokenhearted,\q and he saves those who are crushed in spirit.
\q
19:
Many are the troubles of the righteous,\q but Yahweh delivers them out of them all.
\q
20:
He keeps all his bones,\q not one of them will be broken.


\q
21:
Evil will kill the wicked.\q Those who hate the righteous will be condemned.
\q
22: Yahweh rescues the lives of his servants.\q None of those who take refuge in him will be condemned.
